text: "My God!" the judge cried out. "The boy is going to try to make a landing on the weather side of that pier! He'll wreck!" Willie Kiu was speechless, only his slant black eyes showing any emotion. With a quick shift of tiller, and at the same time jibbing the boom to which he had the stay rope fastened, Bill made the yawl recover.
